name: Lares To Machu Picchu 4D/3N
description: This trek combines beautiful lakes, local Quechua farming and weaving communities who are still living in the stone houses almost like on the Inca time. The trail goes over the highland communities with unforgettable views of the magnificent mountains, herds of llamas, and alpacas and finally arriving to Yanahuara-Ollantaytambo for lunch on the third day of the trek, in the afternoon the group take the train from Ollantaytambo to Aguas Calientes to spend the night and the last day we go up to Machu Picchu to see the sun rise and explore the Inca site.
